other_tests.findings: Hyperglycemia with blood sugar level of 1000 mg/dl (55.5 mmol/liter); blood glucose at 474 mg/dl (26.3 mmol/liter) during right epididymitis episode.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Initially fluctuated in severity, now remains euglycemic since age 5.

other_tests.findings: Identified a slightly small right kidney with two small cysts; left kidney normal.

other_tests.procedure_name: Blood Urea Nitrogen and Creatinine Tests
other_tests.findings: Initial renal dysfunction with blood urea nitrogen of 19 mg/dl and creatinine of 2.5 mg/dl.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Renal function gradually deteriorated leading to end-stage renal failure at 2 years of age.

other_tests.findings: Performed due to end-stage renal failure.
other_tests.changes_over_time: Chronic rejection of the graft necessitated continued use of glucocorticoid and tacrolimus.

other_tests.findings: Mother showed a normal response (blood glucose and insulin).
